slides.title: Data Analytics
slides.content:
# Analytics Types

## Analytics Spectrum

| Type | Question |
|------|----------|
| Descriptive | What happened? |
| Diagnostic | Why happened? |
| Predictive | What will happen? |
| Prescriptive | What to do? |

## Descriptive

- Aggregation
- Summarization
- KPI reporting

## Predictive

- Forecasting
- Statistical modeling
- Machine learning

slides.title: Statistical Analysis
slides.content:
# Statistical Tools

## Measures

| Measure | Purpose |
|---------|--------|
| Mean | Average |
| Median | Middle |
| Mode | Most frequent |
| Std deviation | Spread |

## Regression

```
Y = a + bX

Y = Dependent variable
a = Intercept
b = Slope
X = Independent variable
```

## Correlation

```
r = +1: Perfect positive
r = 0: No correlation
r = -1: Perfect negative
```
